our_candidate.name: Maria Sandoval
our_candidate.background: First-term Senator, former Attorney General, Latina, daughter of casino worker, Las Vegas native, Culinary Union champion

opponent.name: Adam Prescott
opponent.background: Businessman, hotel developer, newcomer to politics, wealthy self-funder, claims job creator record

demographics.economic_profile: Hospitality-dependent economy, COVID recovery fragile, housing crisis severe, Lake Mead water concerns, gaming industry dominant

notes: Extremely close race (0.8%) saved by Culinary Union turnout operation. Latino voters in Las Vegas metro were decisive. Hospitality worker economic anxiety was real but union endorsement held. Reno transplants provided educated suburban swing voters. Housing costs emerged as major concern across all groups.
